name: Sync (Yousurname)
description:
Sync is a puzzle game where you must get all players (squares) to the goal (the green box) while avoiding the red X's. The players all move at the same time, so you have to be careful. Try your best to get a higher score by using as little moves as possible. Levels become more and more challenging as you complete each level, along with new movements and controls.

This version contains levels 1 - 5. The final game will include up to at least level 15. Game Boy Controls
  • ◀▲▼▶ to move
  • Other controls are explained in the game.
Computer Controls
  • ◀▲▼▶ to move
  • A on Game Boy = Z, Alt, or J on Computer
  • B on Game Boy = X, Ctrl or K on Computer
  • Start on Game Boy = Enter on Computer
  • Select on Game Boy = Shift on Computer
  • Other controls are explained in the game.
Credits

All assets and scripts by me, Yousurname. Tools used: GB Studio, Tiled, Piskel, Bosca Ceoil, and OpenMPT.
